resources.string: The Journey of Patel-Apps Pvt Ltd has been started in early 2014 when three friends decided to do something new with their unique innovative ideas & creativity. Our unified efforts have bring the company from a garage start-up to a conglomerate whose businesses span across three country.

When someone asks what we do, it\'s tempting to point out our track record for helping to transform the small start up into success. It\'s true; our mission is to deliver strong, robust software solutions to our clients.

We recognize our primary asset is our people. To be successful, We must be a rewarding place to work. We provide opportunity and encouragement to help our people reach their goal. We work with our clients as a team. this made the company into what it is today.
